summary: Documentary focusing on the career of pro wrestler Bret Hart & his controversial exit from the WWF.
cast: Bret Hart|Owen Hart|Brian Pillman|Blade Hart|Julie Hart|Stu Hart|Helen Hart|Diana Hart|Keith Hart|Tammy Sytch|Jim Neidhart|Georgia Hart|Mark Calaway|Curt Hennig|Vince McMahon|Steve Austin|Dave Meltzer|Wayne Farris|Paul Budra|Michael Landsberg|Mike Hegstrand|Joe Laurinaitis|Del Wilkes|Gorilla Monsoon|Earl Hebner|Rick Rude|Vince Russo|Glenn Ruth|Mick Foley|Dustin Rhodes|Leon White|Pat Patterson|Davey Boy Smith|Ellie Hart|Alison Hart|Shawn Michaels|Paul Levesque|Marc Mero|Kevin Nash|Scott Hall|Larry Pfohl|Randy Savage|Brian James|Sean Waltman|Roddy Piper|Bob Howard|Michael Seitz|Tom Brandi|Mark Canterbury|Jesus Castillo|Jose Estrada Jr.|Brian Harris|Dean Hart|Smith Hart|Teddy Hart|Grant McReynolds|Miguel Perez|Juan Rivera|Harry Smith|Ted Turner|Chaz Warrington|Shane McMahon|Rena Mero|Brian Schaaf|Chad Socolovitch
title: Hitman Hart: Wrestling with Shadows
